Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Manchester in 1975...
Injured on 4/13/1975 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1977, off William Mancha (SHP)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/1977, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Malibu on 6/13/1977...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Columbus on 8/13/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/18/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 5/13/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1984, hitting .667 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1984...
Injured on 7/11/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Ashburn on 6/2/1987...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/26/1987, off Daniel Connery (GHG)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1989, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1989, hitting .611 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1989, hitting .510 with 0 HR, 20 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 7/2/1989...
Traded from Malibu to Capital City on 7/16/1991 (Going to CC: SS M. Pasillas. Going to Mal: 2B I. Vreeland, LF W. Maul)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Bay City on 9/5/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 3/1/1992 to a minor league contract.
